# init(forTextStyle:)

**Initializer**

Creates a font metrics object for the specified text style.

## Declaration

```swift
init(forTextStyle textStyle: UIFont.TextStyle)
```

## Parameters

- **textStyle**: The text style that you want to apply to the font. For example, you might specify [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont/TextStyle/body] for your appâ€™s main content.

## Return Value

An initialized font metrics object.

## Creating a Font Metrics Object

- **default**: The default font metrics object for content.
- **UIFont.TextStyle**: Constants that describe the preferred styles for fonts.
